main event: A bright, metallic, circular object was observed hovering in the sky over Lincoln, New Hampshire on September 8, 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a large commercial aircraft and dull gray in color.
The object was initially hovering, then rapidly accelerated and climbed out of sight.
The object made no sound during the sighting.
The two witnesses were considered to be reliable and of good character.
All possible explanations were investigated, but the case remains classified as 'Unidentified'.
